name: F Solano
text: Great pizza and great company. Good company that's actively giving back to the community beyond just writing a check

name: country_ metal208
text: Pretty good all in all and when you're wanting to spend less, they're a good option.

name: Clint Reed, KE7KVA
text: DO NOT ORDER ANYTHING FROM HERE. This is not the first time my family ordered some food from Pizza Hut. Tonight it was a horrible experience. The delivery driver was rude, the chicken pizza was mostly cheese and sauce. The Pepperoni looked …More

name: Tiffany Merritt
text: So I've usually had good service and food quality.  Unfortunately, tonight my order was left at the wrong door.  Instead of them remaking the order they went and picked my order off the doorstep 15 minutes later.  Totally unacceptable with the covid and all this.

name: Karen Andersen
text: With my budget, I usually go to Little Caesar's Pizza even though Pizza Hut Pizza is my favorite. Just found out Pizza Hut has a single topping deal for just a bit more money and tastes amazing!

name: Meagan Fladwood
text: I actually really dig getting my man his pizza hut. It's on his top 3, and his eyes lit up when he saw the melty cheese that I brought home for him.  Fyi: my son is obsessed with their cheese

name: Steven Crist
text: Ordered pizza for delivery while we were staying at the Oxford Suites just down the road from Pizza Hut.  We rarely have problems with service, but last night I ordered a large stuff crust supreme online, and then called in to ask for paper …More

name: Faith Reader
text: Wonderful, accommodating service. Thank you!

name: Curtis Van Alstine
text: Ordered pizza for myself and employees. After the pizza was delivered,  I received a phone call harassing me that I got to close to their driver during the delivery process. The driver never said a word while the transaction occurred but …More

name: Justin Whitehead
text: Big shout out to PIzza Hut for being at the school today and donating pizza to all the families during this trying time!  My family and I really appreciate it and thank you for your service

name: Crystal F. Olsen
text: Fast,friendly.and ready to eat❣️

name: Jared Day
text: Pizza Hut used to be one of the best pizzas in the nation, especially if talk about chains.  No longer.  They've gone through some drastic changes over the last 5 years, and the quality has suffered.  I now consider it on par with the likes …More

name: Darryl Beasley
text: They help me with my online order good job

name: Angels Psycho
text: I ordered myself a pizza the other night, and not only did the pizza not have sauce on it, but it was hard as a rock, like they had recently made it before and reheated it because why not right? It tasted like cardboard box and it was gross. Never ordering food from this Pizza Hut again.

name: George Benson
text: Great Food

name: Jason Archer
text: Ordered a pizza take out, was ready in less than 10 min and was delicious! Very quick picking it up. In and out, lots of parking, it's in a little strip mall next to the Reel Theater and I never knew it. Overall A+.

name: Tawny Breakfield
text: Quick and easy service

name: Sarah Porter
text: My chicken wings arrived completely plain, without any sauce on them.

name: Dan B
text: the staff here is great! the pizza is always as it should be from pizza hut. never had a bad one from these guys.

name: Rosario Gutierrez
text: Ordered a pizza on Monday, it took over an hour and 15 min to get here, the delivery boy took it next door first because he clearly can't tell addresses apart. Pizza was cold, when I called to ask where my pizza was he said they were super …More

name: nico pike
text: Last few times I've had pizza hut it been bad. Seems like no matter which location I go to, the people working there don't care that you are spending your hard earned money for something good to eat. You guys lost me. I now look for alternatives instead of ordering from you.

name: Justin Jordan
text: I have been to this Pizza Hut a few times now. After receiving nothing but excellent customer service and amazingly delicious pizzas every time I decided I had to share how impressed I was. The pizzas look like they could be featured in a …More

name: Thailer Earls
text: My wings were drowning in sause and all my brownies stuck to the pan. Needless to say I'm pretty butt hurt

name: Augastine Beaner Rodriguez
text: This by far has to be the best pizza Hut in Boise been here 10x now and every time I come I leave with perfection these people do such a great job they get 5 stars from me every time I come here. Made to perfection

name: Jasmine Rhoades
text: Best pizza hut in Idaho

name: maggie sierra
text: Always good service from these guys. The person who answered the phone on my most recent call was very personable and accommodating. Delivery always shows up well before their estimate, too. Love them!

name: Sean Liang
text: I live in Meridian and I go out of my way to order pizza from this location. Love the crew at this location. It’s not just a “job” for these guys. They absolutely love being there, and putting a smile on everyone’s face. The service is truly exceptional. If I could give them a 5 and a half star... I would!

name: Bryson Lewis
text: Best staff I have ever worked with. It's honestly really nice when only your second time in they remember you and remember what you ordered! Never have I had anyone care to do that! Always grateful! Thank you!

name: Tyler Price
text: Super friendly staff and quick service

name: Jenna Spencer
text: This Pizza Hut is my most favourite in the TV. The pizza is always hot and on time! The customer service is off the charts!!! The crew is always super helpful and the manager goes above and beyond to make sure his customers are happy!

name: SB Y
text: This place is horrible all around... Their employees are disrespectful!! Their shift managers are disrespectful! They delivered a pizza that was clearly not cooked all the way and it was just thrown into the box. This is such a waste of …More

name: Aj Jackson
text: Try to use a coupon I guess that was a special offer only last year. Coupon have no expiration date on it whatsoever. Restaurant would not honor it. The only suggestion they could give me was the offers that they had now which cost me over …More

name: Joshua Fusselman
text: The pizza was good. Our waitress, Abigail, was nice and professional. But when I went to the counter to ask for another fork, the employee who was closest hardly acknowledged me, and just called for the waitress to come help me. Sure he may be slammed with business, but a smile would be nice.

name: Ethan Cornell
text: The manager and enployees always pay attention to detail when I order because I have food allergies... I can tell that this location puts the customer first and that makes life a little bit easier. Big props to the staff at this location

name: Laura Moore
text: After waiting 20 minutes after scheduled delivery time my pizza that had spinach included in the order must've been forgotten and added before delivery. The spinach was raw , laid on top of the pizza. So now i have to wait another 15 min to …More

name: Mark Montierth
text: Our go to place after a movie at the overland cinemas.  Pizza hut is a chain so the food is well documented.  This one is in a good location, good parking, clean and consistent.  Love the simple pepperoni or deep dish

name: Jennifer Federoff
text: This location is clean, well run and with friendly staff

name: Jade Stonewall
text: They give out vouchers at school for free personal pizzas for the reading program, which is pretty cool

name: david armstrong
text: i work for pizza hut so i am a bit bias but we do try hard to ensure fast friendly service to all carryout or delivery. sometime so busy deliveries are delayed but can always count on its arrival

name: Vogel Henry
text: Customer service and quality are always through the roof! They’re always far and away exceeding my expectations. Which are very high to begin with.

name: Benjamin Beltran
text: Was referred by a friend to use this Pizza Hut, he claimed it was “the best Pizza Hut in Idaho”. He was right! I ordered 10 pizzas and EVERY SINGLE ONE looked like the pictures in the ads!!!! 10/10 will never use another location!

name: Shawn Mills
text:
Nov 14, 2015 9:00 pm
I called and had two pizzas delivered. Not only were they beautiful they tasted great and the delivery man was a very respectful and pleasant. All in all a great experience....

name: Samantha Fugit
text:
I mean... pizza.
Super cool staff.

name: Joshua Plata
text: The best experiences I’ve had ordering pizza is from this Overland Pizza Hut location! They have always treated me right and have gotten my orders correct, hot and ready every time.

name: Kara Secondi
text: Cleanest Pizza Hut I've ever eaten from. Fast and friendly service.

text: Its clean a good friendly invierment fast service

text: Delicious food and great service. Very nice little family style diner!

text: Horrible experience michael really let us down.bpopr customer servicd.

name: Diane Smallwood
text: Had someone go to this location to get a pizza ( $10 large any toppings coupon) and add wings (16) with a coupon for $9.99) so when he got back said it cost over $31.  Was told that the wings were done differently so why didn't they just do …More

name: Jessica Smith
text: This place deserves -3 stars.  We ordered a pizza online on a Sunday night. It has now been an hour and a half and still no pizza. I called and the young idiot who answered the phone had the nerve to say it will be another 30 min!!! Are you …More

name: Josh Noi
text: Great pizza and great service only reason I am not giving them a 5 is bc I have had under cooked dough more then once

name: Patrick Kelly
text: If you like pizza hut you will probably like this restaurant.  Good service, hot food, clean restaurant.

text: Just ordered from this pizza hut and I'm not happy the delevry drive was knocking on mywindow not the door and when I answered all he said was here you go.. Shouldn't of tipped him but I did .. My pizza was half an half but all my toppings where by the crust ... Still good but unhappy with what I paid for

text: Great food an awesome employees

text: It's Pizza Hut... What can I say

text: Pizza hut is always a classic, and Michael runs a great crew!

text: The staff at this location is always friendly and knowledgeable and fast; And the pizza is as it should be at pizza hut, good.

name: Chris Dougan

text: I had a bad review from a long time ago I removed. I love this place, consistently great pizza.
